attributes.action: Extend maternity medical exemption certificates for free dental care.
attributes.additional_details: It’s only fair that we are entitled to the benefits we should be getting, why should we miss out. Self employed and workers are receiving schemes but seems people on maternity are receiving no benefits whatsoever and missing out.
attributes.background: Ladies on maternity leave are entitled to 12 months free dental care after having a child however we have been unable to use since lockdown nearly 4 months. Medical certificates should be extended by however long we have been unable to use.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324340
